titles.title: Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/23/2007--Passed House without amendment. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from January 24, 2007, until January 29, 2007 (or until another time of reassembly under this concurrent resolution), and from January 31, 2007, until February 5, 2007 (or until another time of reassembly). Authorizes the Speaker of the House or her designee, after consultation with the Minority Leader, to notify the Members of the House to reassemble at such place and time as she may designate whenever, in her opinion, the public interest shall warrant it.
